component.name: Kanban Board
component.description: An advanced kanban board component for task and workflow management, featuring drag-and-drop card organization across multiple columns. Supports card creation, editing, deletion, and column customization for flexible project management and team collaboration.

variants.name: Clean & Simple
variants.description: A visually appealing kanban board implementation featuring smooth drag-and-drop interactions, clear column separation, responsive card layouts, and intuitive task organization. Enables efficient task tracking and workflow visualization for productive team management and collaboration.

variants.name: Modern Detailed
variants.description: Feature-rich modern kanban with task details, progress bars, avatars, tags, and complete metadata
